basic.description:
Further development of French business skills, with emphasis on vocabulary building to further enhance written and oral expression in the context of current business issues.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (18L;18G;84P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Le français des affaires II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    FREN201 or FREN202 or FREN220 or FREN221 or FREN283
